item.title: [PI] Cheat Engine Item Dupe FIX HERE
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

Open up: ShopAssistant.java (located in the model/shops package)
Declare this boolean:public boolean shopSellsItem(int itemID) { for (int i = 0; i < Server.shopHandler.ShopItems.length; i++) { if(itemID == (Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][i] - 1)) { return true; } } return false; }
Search this in SAME FILE (amount > 0) { within the buyItem boolean add this:

if(!shopSellsItem(itemID)) return false;
I Know this is an easy code. But there are some people who need the help!

Read full topic
